original_text: The ten horns that you saw are a picture of ten more kings. They have not yet begun to rule anywhere. But they will receive authority to rule as kings for one hour. They will rule people together with the wild animal.
korean_text: 네가 보던 열 뿔은 열 왕이니 아직 나라를 얻지 못하였으나 다만 짐승과 더불어 임금처럼 한동안 권세를 받으리라

sentences.original_text: The ten horns that you saw
are a picture of ten more kings
They have not yet begun to rule anywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아직 어디에서도 다스리기 시작하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: But they will receive authority to rule as kings
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 왕으로 다스릴 권위를 받을 것이다
